short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to generate strong and secure passwords. with this extension you can easily generate strong and secure passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

    • password length between 4 and 40
    • use numbers (0-9), lower cases (a-z), upper cases (A-Z), special (!?=)(&%$*+-.,:;) 
    • copying to clipboard
